name: AI agent: expense tracker in Google Sheets and n8n chat

nodes.name: AI Agent

options.systemMessage: You are a helpful accountant. Use save to db tool to save expense message to DB. respond with "Your expense saved, here is the output of save sub-workflow:[data]"

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## Save your expenses via chat message. 

LLM will parse your message to structured JSON and save as a new row into Google Sheet.

## Installation
### 1. Set up Google Sheets:
Clone this Sheet:
{{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

(File -> Make a copy)

Choose this sheet into "Save expense into Google Sheets" node.


### 2. Fix sub-workflow dropdown: 
open "Parse msg and save to Sheets" node (which is an n8n sub-workflow executor tool) and choose the SAME workflow in the dropdown. it will allow n8n to call "Workflow Input Trigger" properly when needed.


### 3. Activate the workflow to make chat work properly.
Sent message to chat, something like "car wash; 59.3 usd; 25 jan 2024"

you should get a response:
Your expense saved, here is the output of save sub-workflow:{"cost":59.3,"descr":"car wash","date":"2024-01-25","msg":"car wash; 59.3 usd; 25 jan 2024"}

and new row in Google sheets should be inserted!

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# AI agent: expense tracker in Google Sheets and n8n chat

## Overview
Automated workflow: AI agent: expense tracker in Google Sheets and n8n chat. This workflow integrates 10 different services: stickyNote, agent, informationExtractor, stopAndError, lmChatOpenAi. It contains 13 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 13
- **Node Types**: 10
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **AI Agent**: agent
- **When chat message received**: chatTrigger
- **Workflow Input Trigger**: executeWorkflowTrigger
- **OpenAI Chat Model**: lmChatOpenAi
- **Window Buffer Memory**: memoryBufferWindow
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **OpenAI Chat Model1**: lmChatOpenAi
- **Expense text to JSON parser**: informationExtractor
- **Save expense into Google Sheets**: googleSheets
- **Parse msg and save to Sheets**: toolWorkflow
- ... and 3 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.
